content: Don't forget you can add your latitude and longitude to your Zulip profile, and have a pin appear at #meet. No Colombian pins yet! :-)
Yes, I plan to do that if/when I have a more permanent residence. :)

Note that you are encouraged to rather pin the place where you work or study instead of your residence (our goal is definitely not to spy on your private life). And also changing those coordinates is very cheap so you can update everyday if you want.
